QuestData.Title: Starve the Storm
QuestData.Description:
You fight well for one who must balance on only two legs!
It matters not how hard we fight so long as the Primalists continue to draw reinforcements. We must close that portal, the Storm Corridor!
Fight your way into the nearby cavern and slay the Primalist Storm-Summoners holding it open. I will aid you if I am able.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Primalist Storm-Summoners to close the Storm Corridor Portal.
QuestData.RewardText: Now that we have cut off our enemy's reinforcements, the battle will enter its final stage. Great work, $n.
